title: DOE Awards Contract for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) Licensed Facilities (Office of Environmental Management) ...
text: ( Source : Office of Environmental Management ) Cincinnati - The U.S. Department of Energy ( DOE ) today announced the award of a contract to Spectra Tech, Inc. for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission ( NRC ) Licensed Facilities procurement. The NRC
